title: Any of the above categories may incorporate an automatic sprinkle/a drencher system, if the risk is such that it requires such protective methods
clause_text: Any of the above categories may incorporate an automatic sprinkle/a drencher system, if the risk is such that it requires such protective methods. A minimum of two hydrants shall be provided within a courtyard.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Any of the above categories may incorporate an automatic sprinkle/a drencher system, if the risk is such that it requires such protective methods.
